revised_title: X-ray Reflexions and Dilute Solid Solutions
tldr: The authors investigate the effect of deviations of atoms from ideal lattice sites in dilute solid solutions on X-ray reflexions. They propose a method to describe these deviations and analyze the changes in lattice constants. The study focuses on solid solutions of Au-Cu and shows that the distortion effect can be detected experimentally, while the thermal effect is secondary and cannot mask the distortion effect.
